void ApplyMapCfgToPlayer(
CBasePlayer@ 
pPlayer,
bool 
fReEquip
 = 
false
)

Applies the map configuration on the given player.

Will stack if called multiple times, unless fReEquip is true, in which case the player is stripped of all weapons and ammo first.
